about_the_game:
Character Costume DLC is on sale!



Costume 1: Satellizer SummerIt's a summer swimsuit version of the charming Satellizer.

This DLC contains one type of [Satellizer L. Bridget: Summer Costume].
: Can be applied to all in-game Satellizer Scenarios.

- The basic heroine graphics appearing in the story mode are changed to match the costume.
- In card battles and character battles, the heroine graphics are changed to match the costume.
- You can change the challenge mode player character to a heroine costume.
(* Costume changes are not applied to event graphics in the love scene.)

Try a new experience by changing Heroin's outfit!
